content.text: Ezra still retains his childlike innocence despite the nature of his death. Optimistic and carefree, he strives to make Zel feel better whenever he could.
Due to being dead for thousands of years, Ezra is emotionally stunted, making him perceptive but insensitive (at times) to Zel's feelings.
